<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"getRecurringOrders"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/getRecurringOrders"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request for the active or historical orders associated to the provided account

:::note
- `recurringType` is used to denote the type of recurring order, can be `time` or `price`
- Do note that each recurring type's data format is different, make sure you handle both accordingly
- Refer to [Recurring API doc](/docs/recurring-api/get-recurring-orders) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"recurringType","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["time","price"],"title":"RecurringOrderType"}},{"name":"orderStatus","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["active","history"],"title":"OrderState"}},{"name":"user","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0}},{"name":"includeFailedTx","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
